name: speak
description: A web-app for petitions at the University at Buffalo. speak lets students organize political action on campus by creating petions and gathering signatures from other students. || CSE442, Fall '17.
author: Katie James <knjames@buffalo.edu>, Heeba Kariapper <heebakar@buffalo.edu>, Wendy Shi <wenxuans@buffalo.edu>, Doris Kwan <doriskwa@buffalo.edu>
